content: i have provided this pattern for free but the inspiration is drawn from the melt the ice hat 1 by paul neary 2 for needle and skein 3 a lys in minneapolis i encourage you to use the link on their site here 4 to make a donation to local immigrant aid organizations and the funds will be disbursed to those in minneapolis who are being impacted by ice this version is a classic beanie with a folded brim and stockinette body the decreases create a pointed top and directions include a braided tassel in the norwegian resistance tradition knit wear fight fascism written directions are for one size fits most adults 22 circumference i used malabrigio rios for the sample and i get gauge on a us7 use any worsted weight yarn and needle combo that gives you 4 5 sts per 1 in stockinette best to measure gauge in the round 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/melt-the-ice-hat 2 https //www ravelry com/designers/paul-s-neary 3 https //needleandskein com/ 4 https //payhip com/b/fxkoa
